Text: Aw man. I guess all good things must come to an end. Thank you so much alexisthebest! We are forever grateful!
thank you for all these episodes, you were the only one providing them, i will miss them.

To say I'm butthurt to hear that these AOTS uploads will come to an end is a HUGE understatement! There is no other show I was happy to see regularly here than this... none. It's a great show, and unfortunately, almost impossible to find anywhere else.

Thanks for all the uploads of this show when it was possible, these will be missed :(
